r_text: Visited only a couple of days ago. The service was terrible - you could almost say completely non-existent ! Furthermore, the establishment does not appreciate any form of criticism or feedback - this is definitely not the way to run a business !!!
This tiny, cosy restaurant offers a good variety of home made food at very offardable prices. The bad thing is that it's only open for lunch and for dinner only on Fridays.
Maybe they just had a bad day, but the food was awful, ingredients were not fresh and drinks were bad.Service was ok, but other than that I wouldn't think of coming here again. Ever.
